testcase.system-out: ======================================================= TEST: TESTEO DE SERVICIO ======================================================= INSERTAR -> MYSQL com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver softpet-db.cdqj9uesoo0i.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com admin 3306 admin HQNjvnm1uU5WFsS6XDXnRA== jdbc:mysql://softpet-db.cdqj9uesoo0i.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com:3306/petmedicalcare getURL(): jdbc:mysql://softpet-db.cdqj9uesoo0i.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com:3306/petmedicalcare jdbc:mysql://softpet-db.cdqj9uesoo0i.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com:3306/petmedicalcare ------>com.mysql.cj.jdbc.ClientPreparedStatement: SET @app_user := ** NOT SPECIFIED ** ------>com.mysql.cj.jdbc.ClientPreparedStatement: SET @app_user := 'user_backend' cololcar-> INSERT INTO SERVICIOS(NOMBRE, COSTO, ESTADO, DESCRIPCION, ACTIVO, TIPO_SERVICIO_ID) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?) resultado fue-> 16 admin HQNjvnm1uU5WFsS6XDXnRA== jdbc:mysql://softpet-db.cdqj9uesoo0i.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com:3306/petmedicalcare getURL(): jdbc:mysql://softpet-db.cdqj9uesoo0i.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com:3306/petmedicalcare jdbc:mysql://softpet-db.cdqj9uesoo0i.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com:3306/petmedicalcare cololcar-> SELECT SERVICIO_ID, NOMBRE, COSTO, ESTADO, DESCRIPCION, ACTIVO, TIPO_SERVICIO_ID FROM SERVICIOS WHERE SERVICIO_ID=? modifica ID INSERTADO ANTES->16 admin HQNjvnm1uU5WFsS6XDXnRA== jdbc:mysql://softpet-db.cdqj9uesoo0i.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com:3306/petmedicalcare getURL(): jdbc:mysql://softpet-db.cdqj9uesoo0i.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com:3306/petmedicalcare jdbc:mysql://softpet-db.cdqj9uesoo0i.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com:3306/petmedicalcare ------>com.mysql.cj.jdbc.ClientPreparedStatement: SET @app_user := ** NOT SPECIFIED ** ------>com.mysql.cj.jdbc.ClientPreparedStatement: SET @app_user := 'PEPITO' cololcar-> UPDATE SERVICIOS SET NOMBRE=?, COSTO=?, ESTADO=?, DESCRIPCION=?, ACTIVO=?, TIPO_SERVICIO_ID=? WHERE SERVICIO_ID=? obtener por id admin HQNjvnm1uU5WFsS6XDXnRA== jdbc:mysql://softpet-db.cdqj9uesoo0i.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com:3306/petmedicalcare getURL(): jdbc:mysql://softpet-db.cdqj9uesoo0i.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com:3306/petmedicalcare jdbc:mysql://softpet-db.cdqj9uesoo0i.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com:3306/petmedicalcare cololcar-> SELECT SERVICIO_ID, NOMBRE, COSTO, ESTADO, DESCRIPCION, ACTIVO, TIPO_SERVICIO_ID FROM SERVICIOS WHERE SERVICIO_ID=?
